message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1,100,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000 to make this work.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's close this deal!
I understand that you're willing to come down from $1,250,000 to $1,150,000, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,080,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
